metadata.title: Thursday, 18th November, 2021
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) whether the Government issued any prospecting or exploration licences in the following areas, countrywide, from 2014 to 2019:
(i) national parks; (ii) game management areas; (iii) national forests; and (iv) bird sanctuaries;
(b) whether there have been any litigation arising from the issuance of the licences at (a);
(c) if so, how many such cases there were, as of July, 2020; and
(d) what measures the Government is taking to avoid such legal suits.
(a) why some residents who paid Zesco Limited for electricity connections in 2014, in Chienge District, have not had power connected to their premises;
(b) what the cause of the delay in connecting the premises is; and
(c) how many applications were pending, as of August, 2021.
(a) when the construction of communication towers in the following areas in Kasempa District will be completed:
(i) Kabila; (v) Kalombe; (ii) Maako-Nyoka; (vi) Katete; (iii) Kamatete; (vii) Mufwashi-Nyoka; and (iv) Lubofu; (viii) Jifumpa;
(b) what has caused the delay in completing the construction works; and
(c) when the towers will become operational.
(a) why the Government does not cater for primary school pupils whose schools are upgraded to secondary school level in Chienge District; and
(b) what measures are being taken to address the problem. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Supply - Motion (29th October) - Resumption of Debate: (Mr Kamondo, MP) __________________________
